Macros.h

00001 #ifndef VTDFRAMEWORK_VI_MACROS_H
00002 #define VTDFRAMEWORK_VI_MACROS_H
00003 
00004 //define deprecation macros based on version number that give compiler warnings
00005 //later when files are removed - remove deprecation macros pertaining to
00006 //unsupported version. Build errors show all locations where deprecated
00007 //functionality can be removed.
00008 
00009 #define DO_PRAGMA(x) _Pragma (#x)
00010 #define VTD_COMPILETIME_WARNING(x) DO_PRAGMA(GCC warning x)
00011 #define VTD_COMPILETIME_ERROR(x) DO_PRAGMA(GCC error x)
00012 
00013 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_FILE(msg) VTD_COMPILETIME_WARNING("Deprecated: " msg)
00014 #ifdef __GNUC__
00015     #if __GNUC__ >= 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 8
00016         #define VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, var) var __attribute__ ((deprecated(msg)))
00017         #define VTD_DEPRECATED_FUNC(msg, func) VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, func)
00018     #else
00019         #define VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, var) var __attribute__ ((deprecated))
00020         #define VTD_DEPRECATED_FUNC(msg, func) VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, func)
00021     #endif
00022 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00023     #define VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, var) __declspec(deprecated) var
00024     #define VTD_DEPRECATED_FUNC(msg, func) VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, func)
00025 #else
00026     VTD_COMPILETIME_WARNING("Deprecated not implemented for this compiler")
00027     #define VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, var) var
00028     #define VTD_DEPRECATED_FUNC(msg, func) func
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_2_1_1(msg, var) VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, var)
00032 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_2_1_1_FUNC(msg, func) VTD_DEPRECATED_FUNC(msg, func)
00033 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_2_1_1_FILE(msg) VTD_DEPRECATED_FILE(msg)
00034 
00035 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_2020_0(msg, var) VTD_DEPRECATED(msg, var)
00036 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_2020_0_FUNC(msg, func) VTD_DEPRECATED_FUNC(msg, func)
00037 #define VTD_DEPRECATED_2020_0_FILE(msg) VTD_DEPRECATED_FILE(msg)
00038 
00039 #define VTD_NOT_IMPLEMENTED(msg) VTD_COMPILETIME_WARNING("Not Implemented: " msg)
00040 
00041 #define VTD_UNUSED(_var) static_cast<void>(_var)
00042 
00043 #include <assert.h>
00044     #define VTD_ASSERT(x) assert(x)
00045 #ifdef VTD_DEBUG
00046     #define VTD_DEBUG_ASSERT(x) VTD_ASSERT(x)
00047 #else
00048     #define VTD_DEBUG_ASSERT(x)
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 #if __cplusplus >= 201103L
00054     #define VTD_OVERRIDE override
00055     #define VTD_FINAL final
00056 
00060     #define VTD_COMPILETIME_ASSERT(exp, msg) static_assert(exp, #msg)
00061 #else
00062     //not supported, define as empty
00063     #define VTD_OVERRIDE
00064     #define VTD_FINAL
00065 
00066     //no static-assert available before c++11, so we need to define our own
00067     template<bool> struct CompileTimeAssert;
00068     template<> struct CompileTimeAssert<true> {};
00069 
00073     #define VTD_COMPILETIME_ASSERT(exp, msg) (CompileTimeAssert<(exp)!=0>())
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 
00077 #ifdef __GNUC__
00078 
00083     #define VTD_NOTHROW __attribute__((nothrow))
00084 #else
00085     #define VTD_NOTHROW
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 #endif //VTDFRAMEWORK_VI_MACROS_H
